# jest/no-test-return-statement

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallow explicitly returning from tests.

### Why is this bad?

Tests in Jest should be void and not return values.
If you are returning Promises then you should update the test to use
`async/await`.

### Example
```javascript
```
